refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Pixhalve will take a color pix5 format file of given dimensions and reduce the resolution of the file by one half in each direction using a 5x5 pyramid filter. If a file name is not given, standard input will be used. The -w and -n flags specify the input file width and number of scan lines in pixels. They can both be set to the same value via -s. Defaults of 512 are assumed for unspecified dimensions.
The -h flag indicates the input file is high resolution (1024x1024).
